languages.text: "Сильных мира сего сложно игнорировать — особенно таких, как Лорд-капитан Теодора. Впрочем, лично мы не были знакомы — уж слишком велика разница в нашем положении. Теодора была великой владыкой — куда мне, ничтожной, до нее, средоточия собственной вселенной! Впрочем, шерин, вы были ко мне милосердны и тем самым в моих глазах уже превыше вашей почтеннейшей тетки... или кем она вам приходится".

"It is difficult not to be aware of the powers that be, especially ones like Lord Captain Theodora. But we never met personally, as the difference between our positions was far too great. Theodora was a mighty ruler, the centre of her own universe — and I, a pathetic speck, was nothing next to her! But you were kind to me, shereen, and in my eyes that puts you above your esteemed aunt... or whoever she was to you."
languages.original_text: "Сильных мира сего сложно игнорировать — особенно таких, как Лорд-капитан Теодора. Впрочем, лично мы не были знакомы — уж слишком велика разница в нашем положении. Теодора была великой владыкой — куда мне, ничтожной, до нее, средоточия собственной вселенной! Впрочем, шерин, вы были ко мне милосердны и тем самым в моих глазах уже превыше вашей почтеннейшей тетки... или кем она вам приходится".

traits.locale_text: "It is difficult to ignore powers that be, especially ones like Lord Captain Theodora. But we never met personally as the difference in our position was far too great. Theodora was a mighty ruler — and I, a pathetic commoner, was nothing next to her, residing at the center of her own universe! But you were kind to me, shereen, and in my eyes this puts you above your esteemed aunt... Or whoever she is to you."

"It is difficult to ignore powers that be, especially ones like Lord Captain Theodora. But we never met personally as the difference in our position was far too great. Theodora was a mighty ruler — and I, a pathetic commoner, was nothing next to her, residing at the center of her own universe! But you were kind to me, shereen, and in my eyes this puts you above your esteemed aunt... Or whoever she is to you."

"It is difficult not to be aware of the powers that be, especially ones like Lord Captain Theodora. But we never met personally, as the difference between our positions was far too great. Theodora was a mighty ruler, the center of her own universe — and I, a pathetic commoner, was nothing next to her! But you were kind to me, shereen, and in my eyes that puts you above your esteemed aunt... or whoever she was to you."

"It is difficult not to be aware of the powers that be, especially ones like Lord Captain Theodora. But we never met personally, as the difference between our positions was far too great. Theodora was a mighty ruler, the center of her own universe — and I, a pathetic commoner, was nothing next to her! But you were kind to me, shereen, and in my eyes that puts you above your esteemed aunt... or whoever she was to you."

But you were kind to me, shereen, and in my eyes that puts you above your esteemed aunt... or whoever she was to you."

languages.text: “我们很难不去注意当权者，尤其是像西奥多拉领主舰长这么尊贵的人。但我们从来没见过面，因为我们之间的阶级实在是差得太多了。西奥多拉是位强大的统治者，是她的宇宙的中心——至于我，不过是无足轻重的贱民，在她身边什么都算不上！但你一直待我很好，亲爱的。因此在我心目中，你的地位要高于你那位令人尊敬的姨妈……或者是你别的什么人。”
languages.original_text: "It is difficult not to be aware of the powers that be, especially ones like Lord Captain Theodora. But we never met personally, as the difference between our positions was far too great. Theodora was a mighty ruler, the centre of her own universe — and I, a pathetic speck, was nothing next to her! But you were kind to me, shereen, and in my eyes that puts you above your esteemed aunt... or whoever she was to you."

traits.locale_text: “我们很难不去注意当权者，尤其是像西奥多拉领主舰长这么尊贵的人。但我们从来没见过面，因为我们之间的阶级实在是差得太多了。西奥多拉是位强大的统治者，是她的宇宙的中心——至于我，不过是无足轻重的贱民，在她身边什么都算不上！但你一直待我很好，亲爱的。因此在我心目中，你的地位要高于你那位令人尊敬的姨妈……或者是你别的什么人。”

languages.original_text: "It is difficult not to be aware of the powers that be, especially ones like Lord Captain Theodora. But we never met personally, as the difference between our positions was far too great. Theodora was a mighty ruler, the centre of her own universe — and I, a pathetic commoner, was nothing next to her! But you were kind to me, shereen, and in my eyes that puts you above your esteemed aunt... or whoever she was to you."

languages.text: «Es difícil no prestar atención a las autoridades, especialmente de la categoría de la Lord Capitán Theodora. Pero nunca nos vimos en persona, porque la diferencia entre nuestras posiciones era demasiado grande. Theodora era una gobernante poderosa, el centro de su propio universo... ¡y yo, una patética mota, no era nada en comparación! Pero aun así, fuiste buen{mf|o|a} conmigo, shereen, y, para mí, eso te hace mejor que tu estimada tía... o lo que fuera para ti».
languages.original_text: "It is difficult not to be aware of the powers that be, especially ones like Lord Captain Theodora. But we never met personally, as the difference between our positions was far too great. Theodora was a mighty ruler, the centre of her own universe — and I, a pathetic speck, was nothing next to her! But you were kind to me, shereen, and in my eyes that puts you above your esteemed aunt... or whoever she was to you."

traits.locale_text: «Es difícil no prestar atención a las autoridades, especialmente de la categoría de la Lord Capitán Theodora. Pero nunca nos vimos en persona, porque la diferencia entre nuestras posiciones era demasiado grande. Theodora era una gobernante poderosa, el centro de su propio universo... ¡y yo, una patética mota, no era nada en comparación! Pero aun así, fuiste buen{mf|o|a} conmigo, shereen, y, para mí, eso te hace mejor que tu estimada tía... o lo que fuera para ti».

languages.text: 「権力者、特にロード・キャプテン・シオドーラのような人物を意識しないのは難しいわ。でも、あたしたちの立場の差はあまりにも大きかったから、個人的に会うことはなかったの。シオドーラは強大な支配者であり、彼女自身の惑星の中心だったんだから！そしてあたしは哀れな塵。彼女の隣に立つことなんてあり得なかったわ！だけど、シャリーン、あなたはあたしに親切にしてくれた。あたしの目には、あなたの尊敬される叔母様よりもあなたの方が上に映る…叔母様があなたにとってどんな存在であろうともね」
languages.original_text: "It is difficult not to be aware of the powers that be, especially ones like Lord Captain Theodora. But we never met personally, as the difference between our positions was far too great. Theodora was a mighty ruler, the centre of her own universe — and I, a pathetic speck, was nothing next to her! But you were kind to me, shereen, and in my eyes that puts you above your esteemed aunt... or whoever she was to you."

traits.locale_text: 「権力者、特にロード・キャプテン・シオドーラのような人物を意識しないのは難しいわ。でも、あたしたちの立場の差はあまりにも大きかったから、個人的に会うことはなかったの。シオドーラは強大な支配者であり、彼女自身の惑星の中心だったんだから！そしてあたしは哀れな塵。彼女の隣に立つことなんてあり得なかったわ！だけど、シャリーン、あなたはあたしに親切にしてくれた。あたしの目には、あなたの尊敬される叔母様よりもあなたの方が上に映る…叔母様があなたにとってどんな存在であろうともね」

languages.text: "Es ist schwierig, die herrschenden Mächte nicht wahrzunehmen, besonders solche wie Lord Captain Theodora. Allerdings sind wir uns nie persönlich begegnet, denn der Unterschied zwischen unseren Stellungen war einfach zu groß. Theodora war eine mächtige Herrscherin, das Zentrum ihres eigenen Universums, und ich, ein erbärmliches Mitglied des Pöbels, war nichts gegen sie! Doch Ihr wart freundlich zu mir, Shereen, und in meinen Augen erhebt Euch das über Eure werte Tante ... oder was immer sie für Euch war."
languages.original_text: "It is difficult not to be aware of the powers that be, especially ones like Lord Captain Theodora. But we never met personally, as the difference between our positions was far too great. Theodora was a mighty ruler, the centre of her own universe — and I, a pathetic speck, was nothing next to her! But you were kind to me, shereen, and in my eyes that puts you above your esteemed aunt... or whoever she was to you."

traits.locale_text: "Es ist schwierig, die herrschenden Mächte nicht wahrzunehmen, besonders solche wie Lord Captain Theodora. Allerdings sind wir uns nie persönlich begegnet, denn der Unterschied zwischen unseren Stellungen war einfach zu groß. Theodora war eine mächtige Herrscherin, das Zentrum ihres eigenen Universums, und ich, ein erbärmliches Mitglied des Pöbels, war nichts gegen sie! Doch Ihr wart freundlich zu mir, Shereen, und in meinen Augen erhebt Euch das über Eure werte Tante ... oder was immer sie für Euch war."

languages.text: « Il est difficile de ne pas avoir connaissance des leaders de ce monde, surtout quand ils sont du calibre de la seigneure-capitaine Théodora. Notre différence de statut ne m'a jamais permis de la rencontrer en personne, cependant. Théodora était une puissante dirigeante, le centre de son propre univers. Moi, une misérable poussière, je ne suis rien à côté d'elle ! Mais vous avez fait preuve de bonté envers moi, shereen. À mes yeux, cela vous place au-dessus de votre estimée tante... ou quel que soit son lien de parenté avec vous. »
languages.original_text: "It is difficult not to be aware of the powers that be, especially ones like Lord Captain Theodora. But we never met personally, as the difference between our positions was far too great. Theodora was a mighty ruler, the centre of her own universe — and I, a pathetic speck, was nothing next to her! But you were kind to me, shereen, and in my eyes that puts you above your esteemed aunt... or whoever she was to you."

traits.locale_text: « Il est difficile de ne pas avoir connaissance des leaders de ce monde, surtout quand ils sont du calibre de la seigneure-capitaine Théodora. Notre différence de statut ne m'a jamais permis de la rencontrer en personne, cependant. Théodora était une puissante dirigeante, le centre de son propre univers. Moi, une misérable poussière, je ne suis rien à côté d'elle ! Mais vous avez fait preuve de bonté envers moi, shereen. À mes yeux, cela vous place au-dessus de votre estimée tante... ou quel que soit son lien de parenté avec vous. »

languages.text: "Baştakilerden bihaber olmak zordur, özellikle de Lord Kaptan Theodora gibilerden. Kişisel olarak hiç tanışmadık tabii, mevkilerimiz arasındaki fark fazla büyüktü sonuçta. Theodora; kudretli bir hükümdardı, kendi evreninin merkeziydi. Bense zavallı, sıradan bir insandım; onun yanında bir hiçtim! Sen bana iyi davrandın ama şirinim, bu da seni benim gözümde o çok değerli halanın... Ya da her neyin oluyorsa onun üstünde tutuyor."
languages.original_text: "It is difficult not to be aware of the powers that be, especially ones like Lord Captain Theodora. But we never met personally, as the difference between our positions was far too great. Theodora was a mighty ruler, the centre of her own universe — and I, a pathetic speck, was nothing next to her! But you were kind to me, shereen, and in my eyes that puts you above your esteemed aunt... or whoever she was to you."
